name: Bowen's by the Bays

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Cute, very charming room. The outside was very quaint. Location very good, right in the middle of the Hamptons. The bathroom was small but very nice and clean. The refrigerator seem a bit old, and probably need to be replace, but overall pleasant stay.
reviews.title: Hidden Treasure

reviews.text: We have just returned from a 2week stay at bowens. It was like a home away from home experience. The property is magnificent - each room is decorated uniquely and the standard of cleanliness is second to none. The facilities are fantastic, with a large swimming pool and beautiful gardens. The staff are friendly and welcoming and always eager to help. The central location meant it was a starting point to explore the Hamptons. We would highly recommend this as an outstanding place to stay.
reviews.title: Fantastic stay at beautiful bowens!

reviews.text: We stayed in a 2 bedroom cottage, which was very comfortable for our family of 4. The cottage was very nicely decorated, in good condition, with a useful kitchen, and nice screened in outdoor sitting area. Each cottage had its own hammock. The property is very well kept and pleasant. Our kids loved the clean pool and tennis. The cottage was very quiet - a local train passing by every two or three hours at most. We would recommend this property for a family of four like us with children who love a pool.
reviews.title: Charming well kept quiet cottages with pool

likes.liked: — Quiet clean pleasant property with lovely pool

reviews.text: Usually stay in August, this year June + no dog. Immaculate room overlooking garden filled with iris + peonies, quiet happy time. Owners very friendly, helpful with what to do/where to go. Highly recommend, will return again!
reviews.title: Great, as always!

likes.liked: — cleanliness of rooms, peaceful beautiful grounds, sitting by fish pond

reviews.text: Stayed at Bowens for a week in August. Loved every moment of it. We stayed in one of the cottages(recommended), which had two bedrooms, one bath, a living room, and a large screened-in patio. The grounds were beautiful, full of colorful flowers and green grass. There was a nice sized pool, a playground, and a small putting green to putt around on. Bowens is just a 10 minute drive from Ponquogue Beach, a very scenic trip. And after a long day day at the beach, a hammock was always waiting for me back at the cottage.
reviews.title: Oasis in the heart of the Hamptons

likes.disliked: — Every night a train would come screaming by the area. Pretty loud

reviews.title: Hampton Bays -- Bowens by the Bays
reviews.text: Best vacation spot for family fun we've ever enjoyed!!! Meticulous and cozy cottages nestled on gloriously flowered grounds, with friendly, responsive staff have brought us back for four summers of wonderful stays and beautiful memories. Dogs are welcome, although rarely seen or heard. This place is fantastic!

reviews.title: lovely clean rooms, gorgeous grounds , friendly people
reviews.text: very impressed with quality of rooms and service. Everything was very clean and pretty;an abudance of flowers everywhere and the owners were quick with offers to help with directions, dining suggestions etc. We were made to feel very welcome and look forward to next years visit.

reviews.title: Wonderful family resort in Hamptons!
reviews.text: I recently stayed at Bowen's by the Bays in Hampton Bays, New York and it was absolutely charming. Each guest room and guest house is individually decorated and the accommodations feel more like a B&B than a hotel. The grounds are beautiful - thousands of flowers and there is a pond with a waterfall. The staff are friendly and the price was right.

aka: Bowen`s By The Bays Hotel Hampton Bays
